SelectSentence.Name: SelectDepartment
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select ID DeptID,Name DeptName,Py,Wb,HosNo,Sort DeptCatalog,Mark DeptMark,TotalChief,TotalResident,TotalAttend,TotalNurse,TotalBed,TotalExtra,Valid,ADept,BDept,Memo from Department order by Name

SelectSentence.Name: SelectWard
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select ID WardID,Name WarkName,Py,Wb,HosNo,TotalBed,Mark WardMark,Valid,Memo from Ward order by Name

SelectSentence.Name: SelectEmployee
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT ID UserID,Name UserName,Py,Wb,Sexy,Birth,Marital,IDNo,DeptId DeptID,WardID,Category,JobTitle,RecipeID,RecipeMark ,NarcosisMark,GroupId,Grade,Passwd,JobID,RegDate,Operator,Valid,Memo FROM Users order by Name

SelectSentence.Name: SelectChargeItem
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT [ItemID],[Name],[Py],[Wb],[BigItem],[Unit],[Format],[Price],[MzBxMark],[ZyBxMark],[ItemCategroy],[Mark],[ItemNature],[ShowMark],[Extra],[UsageScope],[AdviceMark],[Valid],[Memo] FROM [ChargingMinItem]

SelectSentence.Name: SelectClinicItem
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT [ID],[Name],[HotKeys],[Py],[Wb],[Price],[MasterID],[Valid],[Category],[superID],[Level] FROM [LCChargingItem]

SelectSentence.Name: SelectTopography
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.ID,a.ContentID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,a.Style,b.Name StyleName from SRTD a,CategoryDetail b where a.ContentID like 'T%' and a.Style=b.ID and a.Status in (2200, 2211)

SelectSentence.Name: SelectMorphology
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.ID,a.ContentID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,a.Style,b.Name StyleName from SRTD a,CategoryDetail b where a.ContentID like 'M%' and a.Style=b.ID and a.Status in (2200, 2211)

SelectSentence.Name: SelectFunction
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.ID,a.ContentID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,a.Style,b.Name StyleName from SRTD a,CategoryDetail b where a.ContentID like 'F%' and a.Style=b.ID and a.Status in (2200, 2211)

SelectSentence.Name: SelectLivingOrganisms
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.ID,a.ContentID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,a.Style,b.Name StyleName from SRTD a,CategoryDetail b where a.ContentID like 'L%' and a.Style=b.ID and a.Status in (2200, 2211)

SelectSentence.Name: SelectPhysicalAgents
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.ID,a.ContentID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,a.Style,b.Name StyleName from SRTD a,CategoryDetail b where a.ContentID like 'A%' and a.Style=b.ID and a.Status in (2200, 2211)

SelectSentence.Name: SelectSocialContext
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.ID,a.ContentID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,a.Style,b.Name StyleName from SRTD a,CategoryDetail b where a.ContentID like 'S%' and a.Style=b.ID and a.Status in (2200, 2211)

SelectSentence.Name: SelectProcedure
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.ID,a.ContentID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,a.Style,b.Name StyleName from SRTD a,CategoryDetail b where a.ContentID like 'P%' and a.Style=b.ID and a.Status in (2200, 2211)

SelectSentence.Name: SelectGeneralLinkage
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.ID,a.ContentID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,a.Style,b.Name StyleName from SRTD a,CategoryDetail b where a.ContentID like 'G%' and a.Style=b.ID and a.Status in (2200, 2211)

SelectSentence.Name: SelectDruggeryBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.ID PlaceID,a.FormatID,a.ClinicalID,a.DugName,a.DrugID,a.HotKeys,a.Py,a.Wb,a.Format,a.Dosage DosageID,b.Name Dosage,c.Name ClassDetailName,a.MinUnit,a.FormatUnit,a.Ratio,a.YkUnit,a.YkRatio,a.MzUnit,a.MzRatio,a.ZyUnit,a.ZyRatio,a.EkUnit,a.EkRatio,a.RetailPrice, a.MzBxMark,a.ZyBxMark,a.DrugNature,a.Specialty,a.OriginID,d.Name Origin, a.Producer,a.AdviceMark,a.UsageScope,a.DrugCategory,a.Valid,a.Memo from PlaceOfDrug a left join DosageForm b on a.Dosage=b.ID left join DrugClassDetail c on a.ClassDetail=c.DetailID left join DrugOrigin d on a.OriginID=d.ID

SelectSentence.Name: SelectDruggeryCatalogBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,a.MasterID ,b.Name ClassName,a.Memo from DrugClassDetail a ,DrugClassify b where a.MasterID=b.ID

SelectSentence.Name: SelectDruggeryFormBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select ID,Name,Py,Wb,Memo from DosageForm

SelectSentence.Name: SelectDruggerySourceBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select ID,Name,Py,Wb,Memo from DrugOrigin

SelectSentence.Name: SelectOrderUsageBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select ID,Name,Py,Wb,Memo,GroupMark,AutoSort,UseageCategory,Valid from DrugUseage

SelectSentence.Name: SelectOrderFrequencyBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT [ID],[Name],[Py],[Wb],[EXECUTIONS],[ExecuteCycle],[CycleUnit],[ZID],[ExecuteDate],[SelfID],[Mark],[Valid],[Memo] FROM [AdviceFrequency] order by ID

SelectSentence.Name: SelectAnesthesiaBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT [ID],[MapID],[Name],[Py],[Wb],[Valid],[Memo] FROM [Anesthesia]

SelectSentence.Name: SelectTumourBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT [ID],[MapID],[StandardCode],[Name],[Py],[Wb],[Valid],[Memo] FROM [Tumor]

SelectSentence.Name: SelectDamnificationBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT [ID],[MapID],[StandardCode],[Name],[Py],[Wb],[Valid],[Memo] FROM [Toxicosis]

SelectSentence.Name: SelectCommonBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.MapID,a.CategoryID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,b.Name Category,a.Valid,a.Memo from Dictionary_detail a, Data_Dictionary b where a.CategoryID=b.ID

SelectSentence.Name: SelectSexBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.MapID,a.CategoryID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,b.Name Category,a.Valid,a.Memo from Dictionary_detail a, Data_Dictionary b where a.CategoryID=b.ID and b.ID='3'

SelectSentence.Name: SelectMetierBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.MapID,a.CategoryID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,b.Name Category,a.Valid,a.Memo from Dictionary_detail a, Data_Dictionary b where a.CategoryID=b.ID and b.ID= '41'

SelectSentence.Name: SelectTechnicalTitleBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.MapID,a.CategoryID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,b.Name Category,a.Valid,a.Memo from Dictionary_detail a, Data_Dictionary b where a.CategoryID=b.ID and b.ID='40'

SelectSentence.Name: SelectRelationBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.MapID,a.CategoryID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,b.Name Category,a.Valid,a.Memo from Dictionary_detail a, Data_Dictionary b where a.CategoryID=b.ID and b.ID= '44'

SelectSentence.Name: SelectTreatResultBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.MapID,a.CategoryID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,b.Name Category,a.Valid,a.Memo from Dictionary_detail a, Data_Dictionary b where a.CategoryID=b.ID and b.ID= '8'

SelectSentence.Name: SelectIncisionLevelBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.MapID,a.CategoryID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,b.Name Category,a.Valid,a.Memo from Dictionary_detail a, Data_Dictionary b where a.CategoryID=b.ID and b.ID= '27'

SelectSentence.Name: SelectCicatrizationKindBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.MapID,a.CategoryID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,b.Name Category,a.Valid,a.Memo from Dictionary_detail a, Data_Dictionary b where a.CategoryID=b.ID and b.ID='28'

SelectSentence.Name: SelectMarriageStateBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.MapID,a.CategoryID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,b.Name Category,a.Valid,a.Memo from Dictionary_detail a, Data_Dictionary b where a.CategoryID=b.ID and b.ID= '4'

SelectSentence.Name: SelectBearStateBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select a.DetailID,a.MapID,a.CategoryID,a.Name,a.Py,a.Wb,b.Name Category,a.Valid,a.Memo from Dictionary_detail a, Data_Dictionary b where a.CategoryID=b.ID and b.ID= '51'

SelectSentence.Name: SelectDiagnoseICD10
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT a.[MarkId],a.[ICD],a.[MapID],a.[StandardCode],a.[Name],a.[Py],a.[Wb],a.[TumorID],b.Name Tumor, a.[Statist],a.[InnerCategory],a.[Category],a.[OtherCategroy],a.[Valid],a.[Memo] FROM [Diagnosis] a left join Tumor b on a.[TumorID]=b.ID

SelectSentence.Name: SelectChineseDiagnose
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT ID ChDiagnoseID,MapID,Name,Py,Wb,Valid,Memo,Memo1,Category FROM DiagnosisOfChinese

SelectSentence.Name: SelectMeasureUnit
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select ID, Name, Py, Wb, Display, UnitCategory, BasicUnit , Rate, Valid, memo from Units

SelectSentence.Name: SelectDefUsageOfDruggery
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT PlaceID,UsageID,FrequencyID ,Dosage,MinUnit,Days,Mark FROM UsageMapping

SelectSentence.Name: SelectDefUsageRangeByDruggeryForm
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: SELECT DosageID,UseageID,Memo from Dosage2Useage

SelectSentence.Name: SelectDepartmentWardMappings
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select DeptID,WardID from Dept2Ward

SelectSentence.Name: SelectIncisionCicatrizationKindBook
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select distinct (case a.DetailID when '0' then rtrim(a.DetailID) else rtrim(a.DetailID) + rtrim(b.DetailID) end) DetailID, (case a.DetailID when '0' then rtrim(a.Memo) else a.Name + '/'+ b.Name end) Name from Dictionary_detail a, Dictionary_detail b where a.CategoryID = '27' and b.CategoryID = '28'

SelectSentence.Name: SelectInpatient
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select * from InPatient

SelectSentence.Name: SelectZone
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select ID as AreaID,Name as AreaName,Py,Wb,Category,ParentID,ParentName,Memo from Areas

SelectSentence.Name: SelectCustomOperation
SelectSentence.QuerySentence: select ID OPERATIONID ,MAPID,NAME,PY,WB,SSLB,VALID FROM OPERATION
